message:
Monitor Stuck Mass Emails at [https://app.joinhandshake.com/admin/object_browser](https://app.joinhandshake.com/admin/object_browser)

A MassEmail must have gotten stuck after 7 attempts. Please see https://joinhandshake.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DA/pages/2424849/General+Runbook+of+Smaller+Incidents#GeneralRunbookofSmallerIncidents-LongrunningMassEmails @slack-Main_Account-incidents-edu
name: Stuck Mass Emails

options.escalation_message: There are still stuck long-running mass emails
